short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over the comments link to get a popover for the top comment on reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to see the top comment of a post without actually clicking on the comments link? Well now you can!!
Just hover over the comments link of a post, and you'll get a popup with the top comment. Easy!
